Using the Reference Pane

The Reference pane displays all references to the item selected from the upper pane. The Current icon indicates which reference is currently selected. References in boldface type indicate the revisions of the folder or item that are its descendants.

This pane contains the same information for any view that contains the item. Most data is separated by double colons (::).

Each reference shows the following information for the item:

  • Project name.

  • Path from the root view to the view containing the item.

  • Path to the item’s parent folder within the view.

  • Name or number associated with the item.

  • Tip revision number for the item in that view (separated from the rest of the reference by a comma).

Unlike the History, Label, and Link panes, the Reference pane has no context menu.
